markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Mug](/Feats.aspx?ID=4932) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 171 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You make a quick attack and rob your foe in the process. Make a melee Strike against an adjacent enemy. If you hit and deal sneak attack damage, you can also attempt to Steal from the target, even if the target is in combat.
name: Mug
